text:
@CoryxKenshin For real...first WW3 crap. Then there was the Australia bushfires that killed koalas. THEN there was the coronavirus, AND it got here causing a world wide pandemic.

And then we had Kobe Bryant's death, George Floyd's death, and the rise of entitled Karens during this pandemic.
